com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent

Class MaxentModelTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.maxent.MaxentModelTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassificationModelTrainer

    public class MaxentModelTrainer
extends Object
implements ClassificationModelTrainer
    Trains a MaxEnt machine learning model for a given CorpusEventStream.
    Uses the Apache OpenNLP OpenMaxent implementation.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      • getCutoff

        public int getCutoff()
        Description copied from interface: ClassificationModelTrainer
        Statistical cutoff for feature inclusion: features must appear at least this many times to be included in the model. Note that for numeric features, any value > 0 counts as 1 occurrence for cutoff purposes.
        Specified by:
        getCutoff in interface ClassificationModelTrainer
